website_summaries.verdict: The unlocked Coolpad Conjr is an affordable phone that's comfortable to hold and use, but it falls short on performance and battery life.
pros: Supports expandable storage or dual SIM cards

customer_reviews.title: to my surprised a very good looking phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the device not expecting much, to my surprised a very good looking phone. The fingerprint feature is very easy to set up an just makes it easier to use apps. I am using a TMO and ATT sim cards, with the dual SIM card feature no need to carry 2 phones. Very expensive looking phone, nice features with low price!
customer_reviews.author: American Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Just received my Coolpad Conjr and I already love the device
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Coolpad Conjr and I already love the device. The sleek design makes it look and feel like a premium phone. Love that it has a selfie cam and uses Android. Although the camera quality isn't crystal clear, it gets the job done for what I am looking for in a cellphone camera. I would definitely recommend this to others looking for a great phone at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest phone I've gotten. Unlocked phone with dual SIM features and fingerprint application under $200 saves me so much money! I really like how convenient it is to come with a soft phone case too. And if I don't use the second SIM, I can just put an external SD card to increase my storage. The phone is really useful and would recommend this to my friends and families!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Conjr  amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Phone looks expensive, high tier, premier but very affordable. Getting great service, great features, love this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Phone is Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: The Conjr has been a very solid phone for me. I have been using the camera and really like the features, especially panorama. The phones screen is beautiful and colors are vivid. I have enjoyed watching videos on the crisp display. The fingerprint scanner is a new feature to me and I don't know what I did before it! Makes the experience even better. Finally the speaker has been strong and enables me to listen and enjoy my music. I highly recommend the Conjr to anyone looking for a phone with fantastic features at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone so far
customer_reviews.text: Great phone so far! After going through 5 phones by Blu last year I tried this phone, way better than any Blu phone I've tried. Definitely recommend this phone by coolpad.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal for a Great phone!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only really understood how well made the new Coolpad Conjr is when I held it in my hands. I had fallen in love with the phone. The elegant and classy look just compelled my eyes. I knew I had to have this phone. I went in blind to the Coolpad Conjr. I have been using the phone over a month now, and I have to say I absolutely love the phone. Every day I learn something new about the phone and it surprises me. Worth the price for a sleek Smartphone with Fingerprint and selfie camera that deserves my full five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chamu

customer_reviews.title: Best Budget Phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is very nice even though it's running Android 6.0 it runs its own operating system at 8.0 some of the reviews say that it is slow you just need to clear some catch data the only thing it doesn't come with the Google keyboard installed
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This phone lacks many features I tend to look for including a gyroscope. The touch screen maybe has 2 points before things start to spaz out. I find myself scrolling through facebook and then skipping an entire days worth of posts because my palm was touching the corner of the screen. After a months use, the phone started to break. Live wallpapers won't work anymore. You can't type too fast or else the phone won't pick up your input. Despite renaming the device, all Bluetooth devices see "coolpad conjr". Battery life is nothing to brag about. The fingerprint unlock feature is nice. And that is all the good things I have to say about this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Colley

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine what more anybody could want from a $125 phone. Absolutely amazing. Seamless dual SIM.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Harris

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing phone, I was able to transfer everything from ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing phone, I was able to transfer everything from my old iPhone to this in a snap!
customer_reviews.author: N Pax Invidia

customer_reviews.title: bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Only had the Phone five months and the battery is so bad I have to charge it two and three times a day and it's an internal battery you can't replace it! Now I have to shop for another phone!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Telephone, so I d'ont need an apple iphone anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it says it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I travel internationally several times a year, on disaster relief team to remote areas, and I do medical mission work in remote areas of the world. I absolutely need a phone with removable battery; the tech info indicated in at least 2 different places that the battery is replaceable, but apparently it isn't. I wrote the company about this, but have not received any response what-so-ever. Also, when I received the phone, I took the nano SIM card from my old BLU phone, which worked at 4G LTE, but when I placed the card into this new coolpad phone, it would only connect at 3G........ I am returning the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Okie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely reliable to run multiple emails and take great quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by product quality, look and feel, and fingerprint capability. I will be using this phone as my primary work phone. Extremely reliable to run multiple emails and take great quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: vespi007

customer_reviews.title: Best selfie camera!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome. Best Android phone I've personally owned. Camera quality is a huge factor for me and this is perfect. The front camera is amazing and very HD! This is a very fast phone with so many awesome features, definitely worth every penny. One suggestion, there should be more protective case options!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A complex device with no instructions
customer_reviews.text: If you are a “newbie” to the world of smart phones, you are going to be staring at a welcome screen for a long time because the guidance provided by Coolpad is pathetic. You get a sliver of nine, 2 inch square, pages of information. It mentions features and apps but no instructions on what they do or how to use them. In comparison, my daughter got a 120 page guide with her Apple Smart phone. I hoped to find a Coolpad guidebook to download on the internet but no luck. If you’re stuck with this gem, you’d better find a guru to hold your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Stanlee

customer_reviews.title: Very solid phone
customer_reviews.text: This is very solid device overall and it has a great camera. The device feels premium in hand and works great on GSM networks. The interface is fluid and moves very fast. I would highly recommend this phone as it provides a great value for the price point. I look forward to using more Coolpad products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: ksolo12

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but slow with apps
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good sleek phone. The fingerprint recognition and camera are great. The dual sim is important for me. It takes only the nano size sims. The drawback was that I felt that it was slow with some of the apps. I think it is the 16 GB memory. One thing you should be aware of is the battery cannot be removed. You have to send the phone to the manufacturer to replace the battery.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

customer_reviews.title: working great
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and it is working great, i'm a novice with smartphones so i will need more time to write a decent feedback
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my Coolpad Conjr. It is a great value. I strongly recommend this highly functional phone.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Macy

customer_reviews.title: it's a good phone. However
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's a good phone. However, it lags when you want to install many apps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Coolpad Conjr – Unlocked Smartphone, Dual Sim, Multi-Finger Unlock, 4G LTE – Iron Grey
product_meta.description: Say hello to Conjr. It makes life easy with a five-fingerprint sensor for swift unlocking. And you can now keep life organized with dual SIM card slots, perfect for a healthy work-life balance — or a life-life balance. Not to mention, Conjr’s sharp 8MP front camera and 13-MP rear camera make every moment look as good as you. Maybe better.
feature_bullets: 8MP front-facing Camera with LED flash and a beauty mode Feature makes for the perfect selfie smartphone. 13MP Main Camera with larger Aperture for brighter pictures with less noise.
Advanced 3D pixel Sensing technology supports up to 5 fingerprints and ensues your dry, wet, or dusty fingers can always unlock your phone
Plenty of power and storage with a 1.0 GHz quad-core CPU, 16 GB memory, 3 GB RAM, and Micro SD support (64GB Max)
4G LTE Plus GSM Unlocked with Dual SIM support for travel anywhere
Premium design includes a vibrant 5” HD display with 2.5D curved Gorilla glass Plus a durable, yet slim aluminum-magnesium alloy body

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars38 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: SIM needle, Welcome Sticker, QSG, USB Cable Charger, Phone, H&S/Warranty Guide, TPU, Case
